events_max_results.title: Google Calendar Events Max Results
events_max_results.description: Maximum number of events returned on one result page. The number of events in the resulting page may be less than this value, or none at all, even if there are more events matching the query. Incomplete pages can be detected by a non-empty nextPageToken field in the response

calendars_max_results.title: Google Calendar Calendar Max Results
calendars_max_results.description: Maximum number of entries returned on one result page
